Kehadiran Dewan Pengawas Akan Menggantikan Penasihat KPK
01 Nov 2019, 18:53 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw


Kehadiran Dewan Pengawas Akan Menggantikan Penasihat KPK

KBRN, Jakarta : Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) bakal menunjuk langsung Dewan Pengawas (Dewas) Komisi Pemberantasan Korupsi (KPK). Keputusan Kepala Negara ini sekaligus mementahkan Isu wacana pembentukan Panitia Seleksi (Pansel) Dewas KPK. Pelantikannya pun nanti akan dilakukan bersamaan dengan para Pimpinan KPK periode 2019-2023 yang sudah disahkan DPR RI beberapa waktu lalu."Tidak lewat pansel," sebut Jokowi kepada wartawan di Istana Merdeka Jakarta, Jumat (1/11/2019).Saat ini Presiden masih menggodok nama-nama yang bakal dipilihnya untuk duduk sebagai Dewas KPK. Selain nama-nama pilihannya, Kepala Negara mengakui dirinya juga sudah menerima masukan beberapa nama, yang sudah masuk daftar pertimbangannya.Agar tidak ada kesalahpahaman, perlu diketahui berdasarkan Undang Undang (UU) Nomor 19 Tahun 2019 tentang KPK mengatur ketua dan anggota dewan pengawas dipilih Presiden melalui panitia seleksi. Akan tetapi dalam Pasal 69 A ayat (1) mengatur ketua dan dewan pengawas untuk pertama kalinya ditunjuk dan diangkat oleh Presiden RI.Presiden meminta seluruh masyarakat percaya serta yakin dengan siapa yang nantinya terpilih. Karena nama-nama yang muncul nantinya adalah mereka dengan kredibilitas tak diragukan lagi dalam pemberantasan korupsi."Percayalah yang terpilih nanti adalah beliau-beliau yang memiliki kredibilitas baik," demikian Jokowi meyakinkan.
Dewan Pengawas KPK merupakan amanat dalam Undang-Undang Nomor 19 Tahun 2019 tentang KPK. Dewan Pengawas nantinya berisi lima anggota, dengan seseorang merangkap sebagai ketua.Ketentuan tentang anggota dewan pengawas, terkait tugas, siapa yang bisa menjabat, hingga tata cara pemilihan tertuang dalam Pasal 37A sampai 37G. Dewan pengawas ini juga menggantikan keberadaan penasihat KPK.Salah satu tugas dewan pengawas yang mendapat sorotan adalah soal pemberian izin melakukan penyadapan, penggeledahan, dan penyitaan. Itu tertuang di Pasal 37 B ayat (1) huruf b.Tugas lain dewan pengawas yang tertuang dalam draf perubahan, antara lain mengawasi kerja KPK, menetapkan kode etik, evaluasi tugas pimpinan dan anggota KPK setahun sekali, hingga menyerahkan laporan evaluasi kepada presiden dan DPR.Seperti diketahui, keberadaan dewan pengawas KPK merupakan mandat hasil revisi UU KPK. Desakan Perppu KPK ke Jokowi hingga saat ini tak berbuah hasil. UU KPK versi revisi tetap berlaku.Belakangan, Menkopolhukam Mahfud MD mengklaim Presiden Joko Widodo tengah mempertimbangkan masukan dari semua pihak terkait Perppu KPK. Menurutnya, Perppu KPK merupakan kewenangan presiden."Jadi tinggal kita nunggu presiden bagaimana. Sudah diolah," ujar Mahfud di Hotel JW Marriott, Jakarta, Senin (28/10/2019) yang lalu.Mahfud menuturkan masukan terkait Perppu KPK sudah ada sebelum ia dipilih menjadi menteri menggantikan Wiranto. Ia berkata masyarakat juga telah memberikan sikap dan pandangannya mengenai Perppu KPK kepada Jokowi.

The presence of the Supervisory Board Will Replace the KPK Advisor
01 Nov 2019, 18:53 by Miechell Octovy Koagouw


The presence of the Supervisory Board Will Replace the KPK Advisor

KBRN, Jakarta: President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) will directly appoint the Supervisory Board (Dewas) of the Corruption Eradication Commission (KPK). This Decree of the Head of State simultaneously confronts the issue of discourse on the establishment of the Dewas KPK Selection Committee (Pansel). His inauguration will also be carried out in conjunction with the KPK Leaders in the 2019-2023 period which has been ratified by the Indonesian House of Representatives some time ago. "Not through the selection committee," Jokowi told reporters at the Merdeka Palace Jakarta, Friday (11/01/2019). still brewing the names he would choose to sit as the KPK Dewas. In addition to the names of his choice, the Head of State acknowledged that he had also received input from several names, which were included in the list of considerations. In order to have no misunderstanding, it is necessary to know based on Law (Act) No. 19 of 2019 concerning the KPK regulating the chair and members of the supervisory board elected by the President through the selection committee. However, in Article 69 A paragraph (1) regulates the chairman and board of supervisors for the first time appointed and appointed by the President of the Republic of Indonesia. The president asks all people to believe and be sure of who will be elected. Because the names that appear later are those with no doubt credibility in eradicating corruption. "Believe that the chosen ones will be those who have good credibility," Jokowi assured.
The KPK Supervisory Board is mandated in Act Number 19 of 2019 concerning the KPK. The Supervisory Board will consist of five members, with one person concurrently the chairman. The provisions regarding the supervisory board members, related to their duties, who can serve, until the election procedures are stipulated in Articles 37A to 37G. This supervisory board also replaces the presence of the KPK advisors. One of the tasks of the supervisory board that gets the spotlight is the matter of granting permission to conduct wiretapping, search and seizure. It is stated in Article 37 B paragraph (1) letter b. Other supervisory board tasks contained in the draft amendment include supervising the work of the KPK, establishing a code of ethics, evaluating the duties of the leadership and members of the KPK once a year, to submitting an evaluation report to the president and the DPR As is well known, the existence of the KPK's supervisory board is a mandate resulting from the revision of the KPK Law. The KPK Perppu's insistence on Jokowi has yet to bear fruit. The revised version of the KPK Law remains in effect. Later, Menkopolhukam Mahfud MD claimed President Joko Widodo was considering input from all parties related to the KPPU Perppu. According to him, the KPPU Perppu is the authority of the president. "So we just have to wait for the president how. It has been processed," said Mahfud at the JW Marriott Hotel, Jakarta, Monday (10/28/2019) ago. Mahfud said that input related to the KPK Perppu had existed before he elected as minister replaces Wiranto. He said the public had also given their attitude and views regarding the KPPU Perppu to Jokowi.
